mapper.select:
select KPI_NAME,KPI_VALUE from Report_DataTable
KPI_ID = #{keyID} and ORG_ID not in ('9900','9940')
order by to_number(KPI_VALUE)

select distinct ORG_ID, ORG_NAME as name , KPI_VALUE as value from Report_DataTable
and KPI_ID = #{keyID} and ORG_ID not in ('9900','9940')
order by to_number(KPI_VALUE) desc

select ORG_NAME as name , KPI_VALUE as value from Report_DataTable
and KPI_ID = #{keyID} and ORG_ID not in ('9900','9940')
order by to_number(KPI_VALUE) asc
select KEYID from REPORT_DIV_KEYTABLE where DIVID = #{divID} order by id
select orgID from Report_OrgDataTable where parentOrgID = #{parentOrgID}
select orgID from Report_OrgDataTable where orgName = #{orgName}
select orgID from Report_OrgDataTable where parentOrgID = #{parentOrgID}
mapper.insert:
insert into Report_BranchDataTable (KPI_ID, KPI_NAME, STATIS_DT,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,CURRENCY_CD,KPI_VALUE,KPI_VALUE_ALLOT,ParentID)
( SELECT #{item.KPI_ID}, #{item.KPI_NAME}, to_date ( #{item.STATIS_DT},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ), #{item.ORG_ID}, #{item.ORG_NAME}, #{item.CURRENCY_CD}, #{item.KPI_VALUE}, #{item.KPI_VALUE_ALLOT}, #{item.ParentID} FROM DUAL )

insert into Report_DataTable (KPI_ID, KPI_NAME, STATIS_DT,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,CURRENCY_CD,KPI_VALUE,KPI_VALUE_ALLOT)
( SELECT #{item.KPI_ID}, #{item.KPI_NAME}, to_date ( #{item.STATIS_DT},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ), #{item.ORG_ID}, #{item.ORG_NAME}, #{item.CURRENCY_CD}, #{item.KPI_VALUE}, #{item.KPI_VALUE_ALLOT} FROM DUAL )

insert into Report_PastDataTable (KPI_ID, KPI_NAME, STATIS_DT,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,CURRENCY_CD,KPI_VALUE,KPI_VALUE_ALLOT)
( SELECT #{item.KPI_ID}, #{item.KPI_NAME}, to_date ( #{item.STATIS_DT},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ), #{item.ORG_ID}, #{item.ORG_NAME}, #{item.CURRENCY_CD}, #{item.KPI_VALUE}, #{item.KPI_VALUE_ALLOT} FROM DUAL )

insert into Report_PastDataTable (KPI_ID, KPI_NAME, STATIS_DT,ORG_ID,ORG_NAME,CURRENCY_CD,KPI_VALUE,KPI_VALUE_ALLOT) values ( #{KPI_ID},#{KPI_NAME},to_date ( #{STATIS_DT},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ),#{ORG_ID},#{ORG_NAME},#{CURRENCY_CD},#{KPI_VALUE},#{KPI_VALUE_ALLOT})

insert into REPORT_DIV_KEYTABLE (ID, DIVID, KEYID)
( SELECT #{item.id}, #{item.divID}, #{item.keyID} FROM DUAL )
insert into Report_EchartsTable(DIVID, DIVNAME, DIVECHARTSJSON, DIVECHARTSTYPE) values (#{divID},#{divName},#{divEchartsJson},#{divEchartsType})

insert into BD_All_Cust_Statis_M (Statis_Dt, Cust_Type_Cd, Org_id_1_lev,Org_name_1_lev,Cust_Cnt)
( SELECT to_date ( #{item.Statis_Dt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ), #{item.Cust_Type_Cd}, #{item.Org_id_1_lev}, #{item.Org_name_1_lev}, to_number(#{item.Cust_Cnt}) FROM DUAL )
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE temporaryReport_DataTable AS (select distinct * from Report_DataTable)
mapper.delete: delete from Report_PastDataTable where STATIS_DT = to_date ( #{Date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' )
delete from Report_PastDataTable where KPI_ID in ('YS01','YS01010101','YS01010102') and STATIS_DT < to_date ( #{Date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' )
delete from REPORT_ECHARTSTABLE where DIVID like #{divID}
